about_the_game:
Description:


MundusHex is a logical adventure game that will transport you to a world full of puzzles and mysteries. Controlling a character from a third-person perspective, you will travel through diverse, amazing locations in a 3D world. Your task is to collect items, combine them in unexpected ways, and talk to characters who reveal more parts of the story to you.

Main Features:


Interactive World:
Explore an open world full of life and possibilities, where your choices impact your journey.

Puzzles and Brain Teasers:
Solve puzzles that require creative thinking and the combination of collected items.

Fluid Narration:
Immerse yourself in a deep story, where each scene unveils another part of a fascinating tale.

3D Aesthetics:
Enjoy unique graphics that combine elements of medieval landscapes with futuristic accents.

Suitable for Everyone:
Regardless of age, MundusHex offers challenges that will satisfy both younger and experienced players.

About the Game:


In MundusHex, each scene is a new challenge that forces you to think and explore. The right combination of items can unlock secrets that lead to solving the main mission. Your deductive skills will be tested in this thoughtful adventure, which is as beautiful as it is demanding.

Join Our Community:


We are enthusiasts of logic and adventure games, and we care about making MundusHex a game that brings people together around common challenges and successes. Follow our social media channels to stay updated with the latest news, share your achievements, and join the growing community of MundusHex fans.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800) or equivalent / Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM) or equivalent / GeForce GT 640 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800) or equivalent / Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5600 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
